Our weekly podcast on the markets, the economy and the world of business

IN THIS week’s episode of “Money talks”, we look at the scandal surrounding the world’s richest man, Amazon boss Jeff Bezos, and the National Enquirer . We also tackle the challenge of the “pink” and “blue” jobs market, where there are still wide differences in the jobs men and women take. Should the employment market be more purple? And, on a scale of 1 to 10 how useful are employee surveys? Simon Long hosts.
